lyrics.text:
Ko e loto fakafo’ou
‘I hono tefito,
Pea ‘oku fonu ia,
‘I he ‘ofa tapu.

Ko e loto haohaoa,
Pea angatonu,
‘Oku mā’oni’oni pē,
Pea angalelei.

Ko hono hiki, ‘E ’Eiki
‘O e loto ‘o’ou,
Ko e ngāue mo’oni,
‘A e Laumālie.

He ‘oku lei pehē ai pē
‘Eiki ‘a ho loto;
‘Oku kei ongongofua,
Ki he tō ki lalo.

Sīsū ko e mamahi au
Pea u feinga loto,
Ko ‘eku fiema’u koe,
Pea mo ho ‘ofa.

‘E ‘ikai fiemālie
‘A hoku loto ni
Ka ‘i ho folofola mai,
Kau fiemālie.

Ko ho fakatapu ia,
Pea u toki ‘ilo
‘A e melino totonu,
Fakalaumālie.

Pea u ma’u hoku ‘Iteni,
‘I he’eku tuku,
‘A ‘eku fai angakovi
Mo e angahala.
